# HashTable.steal_extended method

```csharp
public static bool steal_extended(IntPtr hash_table, IntPtr lookup_key, out IntPtr stolen_key, 
    out IntPtr stolen_value)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| hash_table | Transfer ownership: none |
| lookup_key | Transfer ownership: none; Nullable: true |
| stolen_key | Transfer ownership: full; Nullable: true |
| stolen_value | Transfer ownership: full; Nullable: true |

## Return Value

Transfer ownership: none
